mapper.select: SELECT a.CD_ALLOW AS "cdAllow", a.NM_ALLOW AS "nmAllow", CASE WHEN a.YN_TAX = 'Y' THEN a.YN_TAX ELSE 'N' END AS "ynTax", a.SAL_DIVISION AS "salDivision", c.CODE_NAME AS "nmSalDivision", a.COMMONLY_YN AS "commonlyYn", a.MONTHLY_YN AS "monthlyYn", a.YN_USE AS "ynUse" FROM SAALLOW a LEFT OUTER JOIN CODE c ON c.CODE_ID = a.SAL_DIVISION WHERE (a.YN_TAX = 'N' OR (a.YN_TAX = 'Y' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM SAALLOW b WHERE b.CD_ALLOW = a.CD_ALLOW AND b.YN_TAX = 'N'))) AND a.YN_USE = 'Y' ORDER BY a.CD_ALLOW, a.COMMONLY_YN

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT s.CD_ALLOW , CASE WHEN e.YN_UNIT = 'Y' AND s.CD_ALLOW = 'OVERTIME_PAY' THEN 'N' ELSE s.YN_TAX END AS YN_TAX , s.SAL_DIVISION , s.MONTHLY_YN , s.COMMONLY_YN , s.NONTAX_LIMIT , s.NONTAX_DIVISON FROM SAALLOW s LEFT OUTER JOIN EMP e ON e.CD_EMP = #{cdEmp} WHERE CD_ALLOW = #{cdAllow} ORDER BY CASE WHEN s.YN_TAX = 'N' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) WHERE ROWNUM = 1
